titles.title: Children's Hospital Protection Act
Children's Hospital Protection Act
A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to adjust the limitations on Medicaid disproportionate share hospital payments.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Children's Hospital Protection Act
This bill specifically bases the methodology for determining limitations on Medicaid disproportionate-share hospital payments on the costs and payments for individuals for whom Medicaid is the primary payer.
